pageContext.claim: “Now, the one thing that the pandemic has taught us is that I was right. You know, I had people say, ‘No, no, it’s good. You keep — you do this and that.’ Now those people are really agreeing with me. And that includes medicine and other things, you know.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump’s approval rating according to the polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight is still hovering around 43 percent — hardly suggesting that “everyone” agrees with him.
